item.title: Don't Feed the Democrats
item.description: [caption id="attachment_10218” align="alignleft” width="260” caption="Democrat Congressman attacks college student”][/caption] In less than twenty-four hours, the left has demonstrated its incapacity for civilized living by physically assaulting a college student, then exclaiming the virtues of physical assaults on reporters. Background A Democrat member of Congress assaulted a college student. The assault, shown on two video angles, was unprovoked (unless asking a simple, closed question is now cause for violence) andcontinuing long past the point at which the victim said stop.
